text: My name is Dror.

I'm the Director of Information
Security at CyberArk.

CyberArk is the identity security company
and market leader in privileged access management.

We specialize in protecting
privileged accounts,

which are often the primary targets
for cyber attackers.

CyberArk has a robust partnership with AWS
aimed at enhancing cloud security.

By working with the AWS security experts,
we want to make sure the security best

practices are in line, especially during
mergers and acquisitions.

Those are highly important for us.
We leverage AWS security experts

in taking full advantage of the security
benefits of that AWS provides.

AWS security experts led a two month
security improvement program,

assessed CyberArkâ€™s environment,
identified opportunities for improvement

and guided CyberArk in the implementation
of recommended improvements.

This helped us defend
against these attacks.
Automated security assessment.
Enhanced threat detection and monitoring.

We were also able to enable
continuous assessment,

auditing and evaluation of resource
configuration for compliance.

This includes automation
which not only raised our security posture,

it also helped save over
half a million dollars annually.

AWS security experts
brought a wide and holistic view

of security best practices
that helps us a lot during this process.
